name: Lester RANSOM, Appellant v. John E. WETZEL, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Lester RANSOM, Appellant v. John E. WETZEL, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of November, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Suzanne Noelle Hueston, Debra S. Rand, PA Dept, of Corrections, Mechanicsburg, for Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
125 A.3d 1195
Lester RANSOM, Appellant v. John E. WETZEL, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 18, 2015.
Lester Ransom, pro se.
Suzanne Noelle Hueston, Debra S. Rand, PA Dept, of Corrections, Mechanicsburg, for Appellee.
